title: The most difficult holes in the PGA over the last 5 years.
text:
Test


Code
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)

PGA <- read_csv("PGAToughestHoles2024 - Sheet1 (1).csv") |>
  mutate(
    HoleYear = paste(HOLE,COURSE, YEAR)
  )

PGA24 <- PGA |>
  filter(YEAR == "2024") 

PGA23 <- PGA |>
  filter(YEAR == "2023")

PGA22 <- PGA |>
  filter(YEAR == "2022")

PGA21 <- PGA |>
  filter(YEAR == "2021")

PGA20 <- PGA |>
  filter(YEAR == "2020")

BadPar4 <- PGA |>
  filter(AVG > 4.3, YARDS < 430) 

BadPar5 <- PGA |>
  filter(AVG > 5.0, YARDS < 550)

BadPar3 <- PGA |>
  filter(AVG > 3.5, YARDS < 230)

BadP4 <- PGA |>
  filter(AVG > 4.6, YARDS < 500)

Bad <- bind_rows(BadPar4,BadPar5,BadPar3, BadP4)

ggplot() + 
  geom_point(data=PGA, aes(x=YARDS, y=AVG), color="lightgrey") +
  geom_smooth(data=PGA, aes(x=YARDS, y=AVG), method="lm") +
  geom_point(data=Bad, aes(x=YARDS, y=AVG), color="red") +
  geom_text_repel(data=Bad, aes(x=YARDS, y=AVG, label=HoleYear)) +
  labs(
    x="Total Yards", 
    y="Average Score", 
    title="Scorecards Turn Ugly", 
    subtitle="Over the last 5 years, dreams are crushed when professional golfers play these holes.",
    caption="Source: PGATour.com | By Mason Dover"
    ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 20, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 10), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size=14), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    plot.title.position = "plot"
    )
